function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in the practical impact of NPIs","Impact":"Difficulty in attributing changes in SARS-CoV-2 transmission to specific interventions","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough analysis and data collection to assess the individual impact of each NPI","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling for NPI impact assessment","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Complex interactions of interventions","Impact":"Difficulty in estimating the effect of multiple interventions on transmission","Mitigation":"Careful consideration and analysis of the combined impact of simultaneous or successive interventions","Technologies":"Simulation modeling for intervention interaction assessment","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Limitations in data representation and assumptions","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of transmission dynamics and infection fatality ratios","Mitigation":"Regular updating of data and assumptions to align with current conditions and research findings","Technologies":"Real-time data tracking and scenario modeling","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and data analysts","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions"}]}
